context.detailarmorbar.effects.effect_ty: Changes the type of protection enchantment effect.
No visual effect for protection enchantments.
Display an aura on the armor bar.
Display an outline on the armor bar.
context.detailarmorbar.effects.effect_sp: Changes the effect speed for protection effect and low durability warn.
context.detailarmorbar.effects.thorn.sta: No animation when attacking entities with thorns.
context.detailarmorbar.effects.thorn.ani: Flashing animation when attacking entities with thorns.
context.detailarmorbar.toggle.enchantmen: Displays protection enchantment effects on the armor bar.
context.detailarmorbar.toggle.netherites: When netherite armor is equipped, the armor bar texture changes to match netherite armor.
context.detailarmorbar.toggle.thorns: If armor has thorns enchantment, it will display a thorns overlay on the armor bar.
context.detailarmorbar.toggle.durability: A warning effect will be displayed if any equipped armor has 8% or less durability remaining.
context.detailarmorbar.toggle.mending: If armor is repaired by mending, a repair effect is displayed on the armor bar.
context.detailarmorbar.toggle.armor_type: Changes the armor bar to match the texture of equipped armor.
context.detailarmorbar.toggle.item_types: When special items are equipped, they are displayed on the armor bar (e.g. elytra).
context.detailarmorbar.toggle.vanilla_te: Displays armor bars with vanilla-style textures. When OFF, displays improved textures that differ from original. Credit: Heamaci, snessim
context.detailarmorbar.toggle.compatible: Makes it compatible with mods where health is displayed as a single line. Prevents the armor bar from moving upwards.
context.detailarmorbar.toggle.inverse_sl: Reverses the slot order of the armor bar.
context.detailarmorbar.toggle.sort_speci: Sort special items (like Elytra) to the right on the armor bar.
context.detailarmorbar.toggle.align_ench: Aligns enchantment effects with actual armor points instead of enchantment levels.
context.detailarmorbar.toggle.uniform_co: Shows a single color for all enchantment effects regardless of protection type.
context.detailarmorbar.toggle.minimal_ar: Only shows armor bar icons for worn armor points, hiding empty slots.
context.detailarmorbar.effects.uniform_c: Choose the color for uniform enchantment display.
Choose the color for uniform enchantment display.
Choose the color for uniform enchantment display.
Choose the color for uniform enchantment display.
Choose the color for uniform enchantment display.
Choose the color for uniform enchantment display.
Choose the color for uniform enchantment display.
Choose the color for uniform enchantment display.
Choose the color for uniform enchantment display.
context.detailarmorbar.positioning.reset: Reset armor bar position to default (0, 0).
context.detailarmorbar.positioning.offse: Click to enter a custom X offset value. Negative values move left, positive values move right.
Click to enter a custom Y offset value. Negative values move up, positive values move down.
